definition[0]: involving the agreement of all or most people in a group
definition[1]: consensual sexual activity is wanted and agreed to by the people involved
definition[2]: consensual agreements, plans, or actions are ones in which all the people involved agree with what is being done

example[2]: This move towards consensual politics replaces the traditional confrontational approach we used to see between the parties.
